website_summaries.verdict: Speed and accuracy are this model's strongest selling points. No calibration or assembly required.
pros: Counts up to 1,000 bills per minute
Uses UV, MG, and IR sensors to detect counterfeits
Works straight out of box, with no assembly required
Money straps and counterfeit detector pen included
cons: Some units may be refurbished, not new
Only counts number of bills, not total  currency value

customer_reviews.title: Great machine and even better sellers!
customer_reviews.text: The machine I ordered didn’t work well and I assumed I was just out of luck. I posted my review with a video of the machine not working properly. To my surprise the seller sent me a message and I was able to get a replacement and it is working amazing! I was originally going to put 4 stars due to getting the faulty one but the replacement worked great but the customer service from this seller deserves that extra star!
customer_reviews.author: Itzel Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: G-star is better.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice looking machine. Counts too fast that money flies out of it. When the machine came the LCD screen and wire was almost completely out and I had a hard time stuffing it back in the hole. First time buying this one and only did because it was Amazon's choice. I have 2 other ones at my stores from G-star which are way better and about the same price. I recommend going with G-star.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: No Bueno
customer_reviews.text: Product is very hit or miss when counting bills. Also arrive with the screen cord hanging out.
customer_reviews.author: Jason K

customer_reviews.title: Great Bill counter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bill counter to use in the store I work at, I am a manager and I felt the bill counter would expedite our nightly closing and assist with the speed of closing our tills. It has integrated well with our nightly routine and how it counts works well with how we input our nightly deposits. The only quandary I have is it doesn’t differentiate between the denominations of bills, it only counts the number of bills run through the machine and doesn’t separate each bill count so you have to do each stack individually. It’s a pretty minor thing and overall it’s a great machine highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Conner Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Compact, works well
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. I got this for my brother because he sells his art at anime shows and conventions and has a bunch of cash, it counts bills great as long as nothing’s bent (to be expected). Counts bills and not denominations so you can do a stack of $20, 5, 1, etc. The screen is digital so works in darker places in case you’re consolidating in the car. Also the size isn’t too large or heavy. Overall he’s pleased with it. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Y

customer_reviews.title: Received already broken & you knew it. Smh
customer_reviews.text: Not a great experience! Opened the Amazon box and saw that the merchandise box has gray tape on it. I thought the that perhaps the unit had been returned/ previously opened? I kept an open mind and moved forward. All of the parts appeared to be there. Styrofoam packing was not damaged. Great. The counter, however, would not even light up when plugged in. Getting a defective product is one thing. Manufacturing errors do happen. Getting a defective product that someone else already returned for being defective is unacceptable!
customer_reviews.author: Kimpossible

customer_reviews.title: It did not come as showed in picture.
customer_reviews.text: It came broken, with the screen coming out of the top and the wire hanging out.
customer_reviews.author: Meir COHEN

customer_reviews.title: It jams with the new currencies
customer_reviews.text: New bills are hard to count by hand but impossible with this machine. It has jammed 100% of the time with new bills. Circulated bills have no problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I received it broken
customer_reviews.text: The equipment attached to the money machine that shows how many bills was not attached to the machine I received this basically broke. Don’t know if I can return because the box is ripped
customer_reviews.author: Yanna  Brown

customer_reviews.title: Love it. No problems
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and easy to fix jams. It only jams when you way too much money in at once. If you use the technique the paper shows you, it will not clog ever. I put over 100 bills in and it was fun to watch 😂👌☝️
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: It can count to 10. I only get to 3.
customer_reviews.text: Gives alot of false UV alerts. Other than that works great.
customer_reviews.author: Wiggles

customer_reviews.title: Fast and accurate
customer_reviews.text: I love having this. It has really helped make bank runs a lot quicker. Having to count money for our bakery took so much time and this is a huge time saver.
customer_reviews.author: Deena

customer_reviews.title: Item as described
customer_reviews.text: Great value. easy to use ... counts bills for example if you have 10 $20 bills it will say 10 not $200
customer_reviews.author: V.M

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Damaged
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bill counter for my husband. He said he loves it because it does exactly what it’s supposed to do and saves him time. However, it did arrive damaged. The little screen that shows the bill count is basically “hanging by a thread”. It was obviously packaged that way and shows bad character and a lack of caring for the company’s employees.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Mejia

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate
customer_reviews.text: This money counter is so helpful. When we do our fundraisers it is nice and such a time saver. It’s fun to use to. My kids love to watch it do it thing!
customer_reviews.author: Foot Zone Lady

customer_reviews.title: Very low quality product
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap and not a quality long lasting product I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Todd H.

customer_reviews.title: Time efficient if you need to count bills quickly and accurately
customer_reviews.text: Starting a business I have found value in efficiency. This does what is is made for and I have not found it to be incorrect.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful machine
customer_reviews.text: As an event planner I have been looking for a machine to help counting money after an event! This machine has been a lifesaver and saved tons of time for me with my events!
customer_reviews.author: Cable Jakins

customer_reviews.title: Time saver!
customer_reviews.text: Does what it’s supposed to do love it, big time saver!
customer_reviews.author: G16

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money. Returned.
customer_reviews.text: This counter does not work well. The bills continue to stop the counting even when the bills are flat. We had to run bills through it over and over again and still didn’t know if the count was correct.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to use and haven’t had any issues with money getting stuck like we had with our old one. Had been accurate every time we used it.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Langlitz

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This machine is portable and easy to use and has helped me get done much quicker
customer_reviews.author: TNT

customer_reviews.title: Great product - works well and very reasonably priced!  Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. Works exactly as described and is great. No complaints so far and really cuts down on counting 20s. Still have to do some calculations on the calculator but no bug deal.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan H.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This money counter works great. It's a very practical size. Great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: regina z

customer_reviews.title: Not what it shows
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping it would actually show me how much money I had but instead just shows the number of bills entered which I guess makes sense. Top part which is supposed to display came broken and does not operate, looked like I got a used and abused item.
customer_reviews.author: Will Green

customer_reviews.title: Not for now
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for contenting of money even is dollar bills. Pretty good for small bills.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Not a good idea to buy
customer_reviews.text: Really tired with this product. Too fast and causes stuck bills. Try to do very carefully but Fails anyway.
customer_reviews.author: My

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality Counter Bill Machine
customer_reviews.text: It just a day I received the item, not even count any bills yet, the machine not working at all . We do check the plug and it not working just only a sound like the inside of electronic items was burning. So ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best money counter I have used to date. I’ve tried a couple other models also sold here on amazon and this is far superior to those especially for the price. It counts the bills without jamming accurately every time.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great product, works perfectly. Extremely fast and easy to use and set up
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Parts
customer_reviews.text: The machine broke after a few time of using it. It was to late to send back. Can't find a replacement part for it.
customer_reviews.author: Jami Martin

customer_reviews.title: It did its job
customer_reviews.text: It did what we needed it for. Counting money for atm’s and deposits
customer_reviews.author: CONNIE R BOWLIN

customer_reviews.title: Arrived yesterday, so have only used it for yesterday's sales.
customer_reviews.text: The product is much lighter than my old one, so that's a plus. Had a little trouble feeding the display cord into the counter to attach the display, happily it didn't require any disassembly. Wish the on/off switch was in front so I wouldn't need to grope for it to use it. My old one broke months ago, and I'll have to admit, it makes counting money fun again. Grandkids love it, give them a few stacks of currency and they entertain themselves for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Jim-Phoenix-AZ

customer_reviews.title: Fun and handy!
customer_reviews.text: I have a food truck and this little machine has come in very handy! I do put the $$ through 3 times to triple check. I did the same thing when I worked at a bank years ago. Sometimes I do get different numbers, but not a big deal to run it again... plus it’s fun!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 4 business use!!!👍
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME MACHINE!!!💚. This is a great time saver in a business that deals with a lot of cash. Instead of having to count 3 times, the machine verifies the count. Helps me deposit with confidence that I’m being accurate. We use this for all kinds of things!!! My kids live using it also👍 Nice, Sturdy machine...well-made!! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED 👍
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Butterfield

product_meta.title: Money Counter Machine [Counts Bills NOT Monetary Total] - Bill Counter Machine with 150 Bill Straps - Portable Money Machine Counter - Currency Counter - Money Counting Machine for Mixed Bills
product_meta.description:
MACHINE WON'T COUNT TOTAL AMOUNT OF MONEY, ONLY BILLS. ADJUST SMALL DISPLAY SCREEN CABLE. 



 Money Counting Made Easy

If you’re looking for a solution that will save you hours of money counting while detecting counterfeit or broken bills, Our Counter with Counterfeit Detector is the gadget for you! Able to count over 1,000 bills/minute, the electronic bill counter:

 * Takes the work out of counting stacks of bills
 * Detects half notes, broken, chain, double, and counterfeit bills
 * Allows you to batch any units required for your specifications
 * Is highly reliable thanks to its UV, MG, and IR sensors
 * Counts the total number of bills, both foreign and national



Versatile Money Counters

Highly functional and very easy to operate, the money machine is perfect for all businesses that involve money counting. Measuring 10.8x8.1x9.2'', this compact counting machine of only 11.5 lbs. fits any office or store, being a perfect choice as a:

 * Dollar counter machine
 * Bank money checker
 * Fake money detector
 * Digital cash counter
 * Currency counting machine
 * Mixed denomination counter
 * Electric money counter



Top Notch Banknotes Machines

The value of our bill counters differentiates us from our competitors and makes Starcounters Bill Checker stand out from the crowd. Powered by cable so you’ll never have to worry about batteries, this portable money-counting machine features:

 * Adding, batching, and self-examination modes
 * Automatic start, stop, and error clearing functions
 * Adjustable display and external display
 * Top-loading hopper that holds up to 100 bills
 * Robust metal construction that's easy to clean and maintain



Purchase Your Machine Now and Add Efficiency to Your Business!
feature_bullets: ❗MACHINE WON'T COUNT TOTAL AMOUNT OF MONEY, ONLY BILLS❗❗ADJUST SMALL DISPLAY SCREEN CABLE❗ ★TIME-SAVING – The money counter will save you hundreds of hours of counting. Able to count 1000 bills per minute without tearing them up.
★ COUNTERFEIT DETECTION – Featuring UV/MG/IR built-in sensors, the dollar bill counter machine detects half notes, broken, chain, and counterfeit bills.
★ SPECIAL BONUSES - With your currency counter purchase you receive 150 self-adhesive bill straps of 50, 100, 200, 500, and 1000 USD, 30 each!
★ HASSLE FREE OPERATION – User-friendly and versatile, the bills counter machine works flawlessly right out of the box, no calibration required.

PLEASE NOTE. ❗AVOID JAMMED BILLS BY ADJUSTING THE BACKSIDE SCREW. INSERT MAX 65 BILLS AT ONCE. ❗ ★ 30-DAYS MONEY BACK GUARANTEE – In the unlikely case that the dollar bill counter machine malfunctions, just send it back within 30 day for a full refund!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars62 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
